data.title: Select: Pick out elements that satisfy a criterion—Wolfram Documentation
data.meta_description: Select[list, crit] picks out all elements ei of list for which crit[ei] is True. Select[list, crit, n] picks out the first n elements for which crit[ei] is True. Select[crit] represents an operator form of Select that can be applied to an expression.
data.text:
